description: Weddings are expensive, and Abel Archer knows this more than anyone, as he regularly encounters clients with no idea how much a basic wedding costs these days. Derrick can't believe the extortionist rates Abel is charging, but it appears Abel has him by the short hairs. Derrick leans him up against the full length mirror as Abel shoots his load all over the glass, and Derrick pulls out and blasts his face with a very expensive load, which Abel does not waste.So it turns out Derrick is in good standing with the wedding planner. Now all he needs to do is give a repeat performance tomorrow when the caterer arrives...Enjoy!
title: The Wedding Planner
